title: Sold - Mr. Smith Stays in California
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Sold - Mr. Smith Stays in California
posts.post_content:
There is only one card in the T206 set that has the first name printed on the front.

There is also only one card in the T206 et that has the first name printed on the front and the name is misspelled.

Introducing a PSA 2 example of a true 1 of 1 of 1, Southern Leaguer Syd Smith.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/14675/smith-syd-omsl[/IMG]

This card features the somewhat more desirable Old Mill Southern Leagues reverse and from the overall appearance has not been doctored.

Syd can be traded and shipped safely and securely to any of the 50 states,

and today only will be shipped to Canada for the same price.

Are we sure that's not a brown old mill back... 
oh wait, maybe shouldn't go down that road.  too soon?

if you are still in need of a doolin (sgc 60/5) and are amenable to sweetening the deal a little, I would be willing to execute a trade for this card.
lmk
mark

[quote name="sando69" post=1739484]if you are still in need of a doolin (sgc 60/5) and are amenable to sweetening the deal a little, I would be willing to execute a trade for this card.
lmk
mark[/QUOTE]

PM sent.  Who would have guessed that Mr Smith may be returning to Capistrano with the swallows instead of going to Washington?  :D
